data.eml:eml: A new species of Homoneura (Euhomoneura) from northern China (Diptera, Lauxaniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shi, Li, Gao, Xuefeng, Li, Wenliang (2017): A new species of Homoneura (Euhomoneura) from northern China (Diptera, Lauxaniidae). ZooKeys 725: 71-78, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.725.21267, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.725.21267
